pr_title: [MINOR] Prevent scalatest plugin from running in non-UTs

timeline.message: [MINOR] Prevent scalatest plugin from running in non-UTs

timeline.bodyText: @xushiyan why did this have to change? you are probably right. just trying to understand
timeline.author: vinothchandar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@ sparkVersion=2.4.4
 hadoopVersion=2.7
 
 if [ "$mode" = "unit" ]; then
-  mvn clean install -Punit-tests -DskipTests -q
+  mvn clean install -DskipTests -q

replies.bodyText: sure. the "unit-tests" maven profile sets skipUTs=false, which will cause scalatest-maven-plugin to run tests during the install phase. I actually don't recall why I have to set maven profile here..
replies.author: xushiyan
